additionalNotes: The website should reflect the artisanal, professional nature of a tailoring atelier. The color palette combines sophisticated navy/slate (primary) with elegant purple (secondary) and gold accents to convey craftsmanship and quality. Playfair Display for headings adds elegance suitable for a boutique alterations shop, while Lato provides clean readability for body text. The design should feel welcoming yet professional, highlighting the wide range of services from everyday alterations to wedding dress modifications. Special emphasis should be placed on the premium Mongolian cashmere offering and the partnership with dry cleaners as value-added services. All content should be in French as the primary language given the Chêne-Bourg (Geneva area) location. No emojis should be used despite any in the source content.
